newsitem.title: USA: Big Flower still seeking acquisitions.
newsitem.headline: Big Flower still seeking acquisitions.

text.p: Big Flower Press Holdings Inc said on Monday it would continue to seek acquisitions to expand its advertising and marketing products and services.
It also said it expected its most recent purchases -- Scanforms, Printco and Pacific Color -- would perform well in the fourth quarter.

Big Flower reported third quarter earnings of $0.18 per share against $0.21 per share in the same period last year, saying a higher effective tax rate and the residual effect of pricing concessions by Treasure Chest Advertising hurt results.
